import React from 'react' class Form extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.handleChange = this.handleChange.bind(this) this.state = { nome: '', email: '', cpf: '', endereço: '', cidade: '', estado: '', resume: '', role: '', roleDescription: '', hasEntered: false } } handleChange(event) { let { name, value } = event.target if (name === "nome") value = value.toUpperCase() if (name === "endereço") value = value.replace(/[^\w\s]/gi, '') this.setState({ [name]: value }) } render() { return (
